org.orgName: District Court of the United States for the Western District of Washington

div1.p: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE United States In and for Western Dist. of Washington.
SAM PLASTINO Plaintiff vs. HENRY M. WHITE, United States Comr. of Immigration at Seattle, Wash. Defendant.
PETITION FOR WRIT OF HABEAS CORPUS.
Service for the within accepted and receipt of copy acknowledged this day of 191 Attorney for
TOLMAN & KING ATTORNEYS AT LAW 1112 OLD NATIONAL BANK BLDG. SPOKANE, WASHINGTON
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, NORTHERN DIVISION AUG 3 1916 FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk, By Edm Laken Deputy 2x
UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON NORTHERN DIVISION
No. 3393 S T I P U L A T I O N.

IT IS HEREBY STIPULATED by and between the attorneys for the Petitioner and Respondent in the above entitled cause, that the government may have until November 6, 1916, in which to appeal from the decision of the Court in the above entitled cause.
John J. Sullivan Attorney for Petitioner
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF THE UNITED STATES FOR THE WESTERN DISTRICT OF WASHINGTON. Northern DIVISION.
In the Matter of the Petition of SAM PLASTINO for a Writ of Habeas Corpus
FILED IN THE U.S. District Court, Western Dist. of Washington, NORTHERN DIVISION SEP 23 1916 FRANK L. CROSBY, Clerk By Edm Laken Deputy
